title: Yaa Abbaa Keenya (MK-VCD 1)
lyrics:
Yaa Abbaa keenya samiirra kan jiraattu maqaan kee haa qulqullaa’u
mootummaan kee haa dhufu jaalallii kee samiirra akkuma ta’e akkasumas
lafarratti haa ta’u buddeena keenya har’aaf kan nu ga’u nuuf kenni yakka
keenyas nuuf dhiisi nuti kan yakkaniif akkuma dhisnuuf, qorumsattis nu hin
galchiin hamarraa nu oolchi malee, mootummaan kan keeti hoo humnis
galannis bara baraan amen. Yaa Giiftii keenya dubroo Maariyaam, nagaa
ergamaa Gabri’eel qulqullutin nagaa siin jenna, yaada keetin dubroodha foon
keetinis dubroodha yaa haadha Waaqayyoo siif galanii haa ta’u. Ati dubartoota keessaa kan eebbifamte dha, firiin garaa keetiis kan
eebbifameedha. Keennan kan gutamte gammadi, Waaqayyoo sii wajjin
jiraahoo gooftaa keenya Iyyeesuus Kiristosirraa dhiifama nuuf kadhadhu,
cubbuu keenya akka nuu dhiisuuf ameen.
translation:
አቡነ ዘበሰማያት ይትቀደስ ስምከ ትምጻ መንግሥትከ
ወይኩን ፈቃድከ በከመ በሰማይ ከማሁ በምድር
ሲሳየነ ዘለዕለትነ ኀበነ ዮም ኅድግ ለነ አበሳነ ወጌጋየነ
ከመ ንሕነኒ ለዘአበሰ ለነ ኢታበአነ እግዚኦ ዉስተ መንሱት
አላ አድኅነነ ወባልሃነ እምኩሉ እኩይ እስመ ዚአከ
ይእቲ መንግሥት ኃይል ወስብሐት ለዓለመ ዓለም አሜን::

title: Eenyumtu hin Jiruu
lyrics:
Eenyumtu hin jiruu kan akka kee /2/
Hundumtuu ni ilaala gara kee /4/
translation:
ወመኑ መሐሪ ዘከማከ /2/
ወኲሉ ይሴፎ ኪያከ /4/

title: Yakka Keenya Isa Darbee
lyrics:
Yakka keenya isa darbee nutti hin lakkahinii /2/
Yaa Gooftaa dhiifamni kan kee amma nuuf haata’u /2/
Yaa Gooftaa dhiifamni kan kee dafee amma nuhaaqaqqabu
translation:
የቀደመ በደላችንን/2/ አታስብብን/2/
አቤቱ ይቅርታህ ፈጥኖ ይደረግልን
አቤቱ ይቅርታህ ፈጥኖ ይሁን ይደረግልን /2/

title: Hunduu Kan Darbuu
lyrics:
Hunduu kan darbuu kan darbuu jireenyis qabeenyis kan darbuu /2/
Yaa Gooftaa nu eegi /2/ akka du’a lubbuu irraa /2/
translation:
ኩሉ ከንቱ ከንቱ ንብረቱ እስመ ኩሉ ኃላፊ ውእቱ/2/
መድኃኒዓለም/2/ አድኅነነ/2/ እሞተ ከንቱ/2

title: Galanni Sillaseef
lyrics:
Galanni Sillaseef kan addunyaa hundaa uumeef /2/
Ni galateeffama ergamtootaan bara baraaf/4/
translation:
ስብሐት ለሥላሴ ለፈጣሬ ኲሉ ዓለም /2/
በመላእክቲሁ ስቡህ ዘለዓለም በመላእክቲሁ እኩት ዘለዓለም/4/

title: Mootummaa Bara Baraa
lyrics:
Mootummaan saa kan bara baraatii /2/
Bulchiinsii isaas kan yeroo hundaati /4/
translation:
መንግሥቱ ዘለዓለም /2/
ወምኩናኑኒ ለትዉልደ ትውልድ /2/

title: Hundumaa Dandeessa
lyrics:
Hundumaa dandeessa homtuu hinjiruu kan ati dadhabduu
Waaqa hiyeessotaa gargaaraa rakkataa
Suma kadhanna /2/ yeroo hundumaa
Hirkoo hiyyeessotaa abdi kan namootaa
Kan dandessuu hunduumaa kan kufee ni kaastaa
Cubbuun osoo hin badin nu gargaari Gooftaa
Addaam yeroo yakke jannataa ari’ame
Boyee sikadhatee ijoollummaa dhabee
Nifayyita jettee fannoo dhaan fayyiiste
Waaqa qulqullootaa nun hin irraaffatini
(Waaqa qulqullootaa maaloo nun hin dhisiini)
Saba Israa’eelii Far’oon yemmuu bulchetti
Rakkoo fi dhiphina yeroo itti cimsetti
Boyicha Raaheeliin Musee ergiteef ati
Nutis ijoolleen kee garakeetti iyyinaa
Akka nu baastuuf rakkoo fi dhiphiina
Gargaaran rakkataa Gooftaan sumaan waammanna

title: Haa Galateeffannu Amaanu’eeliin
lyrics:
Haa galateeffannu Amaanu’eliin Goofta isaa nuuf du’ee /2/
Du’a isaatinis du’a irraa nu ofkoolchee jiraa /4/

title: Qulqulluu Waaqayyo
lyrics:
Qulqullu Waaqayyo (2) galani siif haata’u /2/
Guyyaa har’aafi yeroo kanaaf nageenyaani fayyumaan waan nugeseef /2/

title: Waan Nagargaareef
lyrics:
Gidiraaf dhiphina yeroo rakkina koo (2)
Waan na gargaareefi Waaqni haagalatomu Gooftaan koo
Waan na faayisseefi Waaqni haagalatomu Gooftaan koo

title: Galanni Waaqayyoof
lyrics:
Galanni haata’u Waaqa keenyaaf fayyiisaa kenyaaf /2/
Lubbu keenyaan waan nu fayyiseef /4/
translation:
ስብሐት ለአምላክነ ወመድኃኒነ /2/
ወአድኃንከ ኅሊናነ /4/

title: Haa Galateeffannu
lyrics:
Haa galateeffanu /2/Waaqayyoni /2/
Galateffamaadha kan galateeffamu /4/
translation:
ንሴብሆ/2/ ለእግዚአብሔር /2/
ስቡሐ ዘተሰብሐ /4/

title: Qalbii Haajijjirannu
lyrics:
Qalbii haajijjirrannu cubbuu irraa haa fagaannu /2/
Namoota Waaqayyo jirudhaan haataanu /2/

title: Haa Galateeffannu
lyrics:
Haa galateeffannu /4/
Waaqayyoo keenya baay’ee dha /2/
Yakkaan bitamu rraa du’a irraa nu oolchee
Mootummaa saa kennee si’oolii nu baasee
Mana bara baraa jireenya nuuf kennee
Abbaa guddaa qabna yoommu kan nu hin dhisne
Namni yoo natuffate rakkoo koo ilaalee
Firri na baqatus abdii hinqabu jedhee
Gargaraan dhugumaa Waaqni yoom nadhiisee
Harka koo naqabee Gooftaan ol nakaase
Du’a keenya du’ee jireenya nukenneef
Maal isaaf kenniina Iyeessus Kiristosiif
Gocha isaa guddaadhaaf kan Waaqni nuu oolef
Ililleef gammachuun tokkummaan faarfannaaf

title: Maqaa Isaa Faarfadhaa
lyrics:
Maqaa isaa faarfadhaa /2/ galata dhiyeessaa Gooftummaa isaatiif /2/
Waaqayyo keenyaan /2/ gochi kee guddaadha jedhaa /2/
translation:
ወዘምሩ ለስሙ/2/ ሀቡ አኰቴተ ለስብሐቲሁ/2/
በልዎ ለእግዚአብሔር ግሩም ግብርከ/2/

title: Hammeenya Fageessi
lyrics:
Haammenya fageessi /2/
Dhiifama nuufgodhi /3/ qulqullu abbaa keenya
Iyyesuus kiristoos /2/ mootii mootota
Yeroo rakkoo keenyaa yeroo dhiphinafi yeroo qoruumsattii
Kadhaa keenya dhagayi

title: Galata Waaqayyoo
lyrics:
Galata Waaqayyoo /4/
Kan yoonaan nuga’ee/2/ Galata Waaqayyoo

title: Waaqni Haagalatoomu
lyrics:
Waaqni Haagalatomuu guyyaa har’aa ebbisee nukennee/2/ Eyyee
Bakka jirrurraa nuwaamee/2/ kan yoonaan nuga’ee/2/ Eyyee

title: Jechakee Dhaga’uf
lyrics:
Jechakee dhaga’uuf Gooftaa laphee koo naa baanii/2/
Laphee Liidiyaa/3/ akkuma banteefi /2/

title: Kan Akka Koo
lyrics:
Kan akka koo hin jiru Kan akka koo cubbuu kan hojjate hin jiru/2/
Hin jiru kan akka kee /3/ yaa Waaqayyoo obsaani/2/
Aduunya hunda kan uumete fayisaa aduunyaa kiristoosii /2/
Dhiiga cinaacha keetiin/3/ cubbu keenya hunda nuuhaqi/2/
translation:
አልቦ ዘከማየ/2/ አበሳ ኃጢአት ገባሬ/2/
ወአልቦ ዘከማከ/3/ እግዚአብሔር መሐሪ/2/ ኧኸ
መድኃኔዓለም ክርስቶስ ዓለማተ ኲሉ ፈጣሪ /2/
በደመ ገቦከ/3/ ኃጢያትዬ አስተስሪ /2/ ኧኸ

title: Eyyee Qaraaniyootti
lyrics:
Eyyee Qaraaniyootti eyyee dhiiga dhangala’een/2/
Eyyee ulfina maqaa keen yaa Gooftaa ati nuuf dhiisi/2/
translation:
ኸ በቀራኒዮ ኧኸ በፈሰሰው ደምህ /2/
ኧኸ በክቡር ስምህ አምላክ ሆይ ማረን እባክህ/2/

title: Dhugumaa Dhugaa dha
lyrics:
Dhuguma dhugaadha /4/
Galateeffameeraa gaara-taaboritti/4/
translation:
አማን በአማን /4/
ተሰብሐ በደብረታቦር/4/

title: Jajjabaadha (MK Lak 1)
lyrics:
Jajjabaadha /2/ amanti keessanitti jabaadha /2/
Sobaan dhugaa bahuun hin danda'amu /4/ eyyee
Ni amanna niabdanna ergamoota waaqaattis imanna /2/
Yeroo rakkiinaafi yeroo gidiiraa yeroo dhiphiinaafis abdii nuuta’u /2/ eyyee
Yaa Maaraamii yaahaadhaakoo dhaabbadhu mirgakoo /2/
Ilmakee naaf kadhuu waa’ee cubuukoo /4/eyyee

title: Waaqayyoo Nudhaga’i
lyrics:
Waaqayyoo nudhaga’i baay’isnee sikadhanna/2/
Tolummaakeen nuyaadadhuu qulqulloofnee lammii kan kee taanaa/2/

title: Iyyerusaalem Galuuf
lyrics:
Jaalalli Waaqayyoo guyyaa jimaataa fannoorratti mul’ateera /2/
Iyyerusaalem nugalchuudhaaf biyya haaraa/4/
Iyyerusaalem galuuf jajjabaadha yeroo hundaa yaanamoota/2/
Dhiyaateera dhufaatiin Gooftaa dha/4/
Eenyu kan qophaa’e Iyyerusaalem ishee haaraa galuudhaafi/2/
Qulqulloota wajjiin mirga isaa dhaabbachuufi/2/

title: Naakenni Waaqayyoo
lyrics:
Naakenni Waaqayyoo sammuuf qalbii yeroo hundaa kan siyaadu /2/
Lubbuukoos naataasisi seerakee qofaan kan gammadduu /2/

title: Yaa Waaqayyoo Siyaagalatu
lyrics:
Yaa Waaqayyoo siyaagalatu yaa Waaqayyoo maqaan kee haa’ulfaatu /2/
Lafa jalas taanan sami irras kan balali’u yoo barbaadne hin jiru kan amma
Waaqa keenya ga’u inni hundumarra caala galanni isa haaga’u /2/

title: Galata Waaqayyo
lyrics:
Galata Waaqayyoo yeroo hundumaatti/2/
Akka Daawiit anuu garbicha isaati /4/Eyyee
Gooftaan koo Amaanu’eel baay’ee najaalate/2/
Seexana harkaa dhiiga isaan na bitate/4/Eyyee
Seexanni haa leeyaatu mormituun dinnikoo/2/
Humna Gooftaan mo’achuun yoomis kan koo/4/Eyyee

title: Galata Kee
lyrics:
Galatakee yaa Waaqayyoo koo /2/
Sin kadhadha sin kabaja bara jireenya koo waan naa dhiifteef balleessaa koo
hunduma cuubbuu koo/2/

title: Waaqayoo Qulqullu (MK L.2)
lyrics:
Waaqayyoo qulqulluu /3/ uumaa uumamtootaa
Sigalateeffannaa yaa mootii moototaa /2/
Gooftaa gooftotaa fi abboomaa hundumaa
Uumamtoota keetin kan taate beekamaa
Fayyisaan keenyaaf eegaan keenya suma
Jaalalli nuuf qabdu hammana hin jedhamu
Kan namoota wajjiin wal hin madaallamu
Kan kee ol aanadha eessattuu hin argamu
Yoo dadhabnee kufnees harka keen nu kaasta
Hidhaa cubbuu keessaa humna keen nu baafta
Gara jireenyaatiis jaalalaan nu waamtaa
Ijoollee kee taane akka hin garboofnee
Addunya kanaafis akka hin bitamne
Yaa gooftaa nu eegi human kee abdane

title: Gochi Gooftaa
lyrics:
Gochi Gooftaa keenyaa nu baay’ata jira
Tolumma isaa hundaaf galata galchina
Yeroo rakkoo keenya dhiphinaa nu baasa
Yakkaan yoo kufnelle jaalalan nu kaasa
Cubbuu keenya baay’ee gonkummaa ballessee
Mo’annaa nuuf kennee bilisa nu baasee
Jibba keenya dhiisee inni nu jaalate
Balleessuma keenyaaf beela’ee dheebote
Hammeenya namoota hunduma isaa obse
Icciti jaalala isaa fannoodhaan mul’ise
Ka’aa yaa namootaa gara isaattii deebina
Cubbuu irraa fagaanne seera isaa rawwanna
Uffata salphina ofii irra mulqinee
Haa taanu qulqulloota qalbii jijjiirranne

title: Mana Waaqayyoo
lyrics:
Namoota haa deemnuu mana Waaqa keenya
Bakka itti argannu nagaa lubbuu keenya
Cubbuu irra fagaannee qophofnee haa jiraannu
Jecha isaa dhageenye qalbii haa jijjirannu
Nuti kan amannee bakka itti faarfannu
Rakkina keenyas iddoo itti himannu
Galata Waaqayyoo kan itti galfannu
Mana Waaqayyooti kan jiraatu yoomiyyu
Fuldura kakuu isaa sodaadhaan dhabbanna
Akka saba Israa’el ilill ilill jenna
Mana isaa keessatti inni nu haa mil’atu
Jennee haa kadhannu Gooftaan nu haa filatu
Kufanii ka’uunis haammam yoo baay’ate
Mana isaa jiraachuuf Gooftaan nu filate
Qormaatas dandeenye jabaanne haa dhaabbannu
Mootumma Waaqayyoo abdii haa godhannu

title: Yeroo Isin Dhuftani
lyrics:
Yeroo isin dhuftani /2/ mana waaqa keenya /2/
Gammada namoota isin simatti Maariyaam haati keenya /4/ eyyee
Eegaa yaa namoota lubbu keessan /2/ waaqayyoodhaaf kennaa/2/
Maariyaam haati keenya nugorsiti kaane dhaggeeffanna/4/ eyyee
Hammeenya dhiisaati koottaamee/2/ yaa namaa/2/
Waaqayyoon haakadhanu galgalas /2/ ganama/4/eyyee

title: Du’a keessaa
lyrics:
Du’a keessaa nu baaftee jaalala keetiin nu waamtee /2/
Galanni siif haa ta’u /2/ yaa Waaqayyoo /4/ eyyee

title: Ishoo
lyrics:
Ishoo Gooftaan nuudhalate qorichi keenya/2/
Ifni addunya dhalateera ifni addunya hunda/2/
Raajoni raajani waa’ee dhaloota isaa
Dinqisifachudhaan foon namaa uffachu isa
Qulqullooni gooftaa abdiidhaan jiraatan
Kan Addaamif gale waadaa yaadachuudhaan
Addaamin deebisuuf gara jireenyaatii
Akka bade hin hafne biyya lafaa irratti
Angoo irraa gad-bu’ee jaalalaaf bitame
Dallaa keessa ciise huccudhaan marame
Yakka keenya ilaale waaqni nu hin dhiisne
Tokkicha ilma isaa dabarsee nuu kenne
Jaalalli isaa guddaan hammana hin jedhamu
Jecha ilmaan namaan himamee hin dhumu

title: Urjiidhaan dhufan
lyrics:
Warri haayyoota dhufan/2/Urjii hordofani /2/
Amaanu’eeliifi /4/ sagaduuf Amaanu’eeliifi /2/ eyyee/3/
translation:
በኮከብ መጽኡ /2/ ሰብአ ሰገል /2/
ለአማኑኤል /4/ ይስግዱ ለአማኑኤል /2/ ኧኸ/3/

title: Samii irraa nibu’ee
lyrics:
Samii irraa nibu’ee dhalate dubroo Maraamii irraa /2/
Foon dubroo Maraami /2/uffatee addunyaa fayyisuuf /2/ eyyee/3/
translation:
እምሰማያት ወረደ ወእማርያም ተወልደ /2/ /2/
ከመ ይኩን ቤዛ /2/ ለኲሉ ዓለም ወለብሰ ሥጋ ማርያም/2/ ኧኸ/3/

title: Dalla keessa ciisee
lyrics:
Dalla keessa ciisee huccuudhaan marame /2/
Fayyiisaan addunyaa /2/har’a ni dhalate /2/
translation:
በጎል ሰከበ በአጽርት ተጠብለለ /2/
ቤዛ ኲሉ ዓለም /2/ ዮም ተወልደ /2/

title: Kunoo dhalatera
lyrics:
Kunoo dhalatera fayyisaan addunyaa/3/
Ishoo dhalatera fayyisaan addunyaa/3/
Raajjooni hundinu Raajii dubbatanii/3/
Tokkichi Ilma Waaqa nii bu’a jeedhani/3/

Haayyoonni dhufanii hundinuu sagaduuf/3/
Mootiin Israa’elii dhalate jechuudhaan/3/
Haayyooni dhufanii kennaa qabatanii/3/
Warqee ixxaana fi karbee dhiyeessani sagadan/3/
Ijoollee haa deemnu gara Beetalihemii
Bishaan ta’eera dammaa fi aannanii

title: Afuuran Niguddataa
lyrics:
Afuuraan niguddatee humnarraa gara humnatti /2/
Luubadha luubaa fi raajicha /2/ Yoohannis cuuphaani /2/
translation:
በመንፈስ የሐውር እም ኃይል ዉስተ ኃይል /2/
ካህን/2/ ወነቢይ ካህን ወነቢይ ዮሐንስ መጥምቅ/2/

title: Qorichi Keenya
lyrics:
Qorichi keenya nuu cuuphameeraa /2/
Kana booda nagaa yaa hordofnuu /4/
translation:
መድኃኒነ ተጠምቀ ነዋ /2/
ይእዜኒ ለሰላም ንትልዋ/4/

title: Deeme Iyesus
lyrics:
Deeme Iyyeesus/4/
Galila irraa /3/ gara Yoordanosi /2/
translation:
ሖረ ኢየሱስ /4/
እመ ገሊላ/3/ ኀበ ዮርዳኖስ /2/

title: Dhuufe jechi
lyrics:
Dhuufe jechi duumessa irraa akkas kan jedhu /2/
Kan jaalladhuufi kan kabaju Ilmii koo Isadhaa /4/
translation:
መጽአ ቃል እምደመና ዘይብል /2/
ዝንቱ ውዕቱ ወልድየ ዘአፈቅር /4/

title: Dhuguma dhugaadha
lyrics:
Dhuguma dhugaadha /4/
Ajja’ibumadhaa cuphamuun Gooftadhaa/4/
translation:
አማን በአማን /4/
መንክር ስብሐተ ጥምቀቱ /4/

title: Harka Yohaannisiin cuuphame
lyrics:
Harka Yohaannisiin cuuphame Iyyeesus Naazrawiin /2/
Gooftan keenya /5/ Iyyeesus Nazrawiin /2/
translation:
በዕደ ዮሐንስ ተጠምቀ ኢየሱስ ናዝራዊ /2/
ሰማያዊ /5/ በዕደ ምድራዊ /2/

title: Gooftaan cuuphamee
lyrics:
Hallee/3/ luuyaa hallehalle luuyaa /4/
Gooftaan cuphameerra harka namaatinii /4/
Hallee/3/ luuyaa hallehalle luuyaa /4/
Yaa Goofta uummaniikee fayyan dhalachuukeen
Yaa Goofta uummaniikee fayyan cuphamuu keen /2/
translation:
ሃሌ /3/ ሉያ ሃሌ ሃሌ ሉያ/2/ /4/
ተጠምቀ ሰማያዊ በዕደ መሬታዊ /4/
ሃሌ /3/ ሉያ ሃሌ ሃሌ ሉያ/2/ /4/
አምላክ ሆይ ሕዝቦችህ ዳኑ በልደትህ አምላክ ሆይ ሕዝቦችህ ዳኑ
በጥምቀትህ/2

title: Kan Hin Duune Du’ee
lyrics:
Maaloo! kan hin duune du’ee /2/
Deeme Qaraaniyoo namaan haarkifame
Kufee osoo ka’uu baay’ee gidiramee
Du’aa nuhaambisuuf kan hin duune du’ee/2/
Harka fi miila hidhame gara fannoo deeme
Dhukkuba isa obsee yeroo akkas reebame
Baayistee niboosse Maariyaam dubrooni
Kiristoos Ilmi ishee fannifamnaan Gooftaan
Ayihudoota birat murtiin dogoggoree
Cubbamaan hiikamee qulqulluun qabame
Jaalala keenyaaf kan hin duune du’ee
Qaraaniyoo oole fannoon fannifame
Yoosef Niqoodimoos foon isaa kadhatani
Akka isaanii kennuuf mootummaan isaani
Foon isaa awዋallani awwaala haaraattii
Qulqulluuu qulqulluu ulfaataa jechuun

title: Fannoo keetiin
lyrics:
Fannoo keetiin nugargaarii /2/
Humna kees abdanneerraa /4/
translation:
በመስቀልከ ርድአነ /2/
ወበኃይልከ ተማህጸነ /4/

title: Lola Fannosaatin
lyrics:
Lola fannoosaatin ajjeese /2/
Fannoo isaatiin namoota fayyuma nu hire /4/

title: Jaalalaan Hunda Goote
lyrics:
Jaalalaan Hunda goote nama fayyisuuf fannoorra oolte /2/
Baay’ateera bay’ate jaalalli kee/2/ yaa Waaq galata kee/2/

title: Abidda hamaarraa
lyrics:
Abidda hamaarraa humna isaatiin nu ofkalcheera /2/
Gooftaan ifa gonfachuudhaan du’a irraa nuuf ka’eera /4/
translation:
እምቶነ እሳት ዘይነድድ አንገፈነ /2/
ብርሃናተ ዘይትአጸፍ ተንስአ ለነ /2/

title: Du’aa Ka’uu kee
lyrics:
Du’aa Ka’uukee kan amኑu nuufi/2/
Gara keenya nu ergi ifa kee /4/
translation:
ትንሳኤከ ለእለ አመነ /2/
ብርሀነከ ፈኑ ዲቤነ /4/

title: Dhuguma dhugaadha
lyrics:
Dhuguma dhugaadha /4/
Ka’eera du’a injifatee /4/
translation:
አማን በአማን /2/
ተንስአ እምነሙታን /4/

title: Lafti qulqullofte
lyrics:
Lafti qulqullofte baay’ee nigamadee /2/
Dhiiga kiristoosiin dhuguma dhiiqamtee /4/
translation:
ወምድርኒ ተገብር ፋሲካ /2/
ተሀጺባ በደመ ክርስቶስ /4/

title: Du’aarraa ka’eeraa
lyrics:
Du’aarraa ka’eeraa kiristoos humna jabaa fi angooni /2/
Seexana hidheebilisa baase Addaamini nageenya /3/ kana booda haatau nageenya /2/
translation:
ክርስቶስ ተንስአ እሙታን በአቢይ ኃይል ወስልጣን /2/
አሰሮ ለሰይጣን አጋዞ ለአዳም ሰላም/3/ እምይእዜሰ ይኩን ሰላም /2/

title: Isin Garuu Turaa
lyrics:
Isin garuu turaa biyya Iyyarusaleem keessa /2/
Hanga argatanitti humna samirra /4/
translation:
አንትሙሰ ንበሩ ሀገረ ኢየሩሳሌም /2/
እስከትለብሱ ኃይለ እምአርያም /4/

title: Hafuurri Qulqulluun Bu’e
lyrics:
Haafurri Qulqulluun ni bu’e duuka bu’oota irratti /2/
Fakkeessame /5/ labooba ibidaatiin /2/
translation:
መንፈስ ቅዱስ ወረደ ላዕለ ሐዋርያት /2/
ተመሲሎ/5/ በነደ እሳት /2/

title: Eenyuttan Himadhaa
lyrics:
Eenyuttan himadha gadda lubbuu kootii
Sumatti malee yaa Maariyam haadhakoo /2/
Daddafitii /2/ nadhagahii kadhaa kan koo /4
translation:
ለመኑ እነግር ኃዘነ ልብየእንበሌኪ ማርያም እግዝእትየ /2/
ወፍጡነ/2/ስምዕኒ ጸሎትየ /4/

title: Maariyaamiin Gadda Lubbuu
lyrics:
Maariyaamiin gadda lubbuu nama ni salphisitii/2/
Gadda lubbuu keenya /4/ ni salphisti /2/ eyyee
translation:
ማርያም ኃዘነ ልቡና ታቀልል /2/
ኃዘነ ልቡና/4/ታቀልል ኧኸ /2/

title: Raawwatame Hannaa
lyrics:
Raawwatame Haannaa dhala keetiin /2/
Abdiን qulqulloota abbootii keetii /2/ eyyee
translation:
ተፈጸመ ሐና በወለትኪ/2/
ተስፋ ቅዱሳን አበውኪ ተስፋ ቅዱሳን አበው /2/

title: Maarami Giifti koo
lyrics:
Maarami Giifti koo haadha Goftaa keenyaa
Waaqni haagalatoomu kan siikeene Addunya
Dhiifama naa kadhu ilma kee haadha keenya /2/
Haadha keenyaa /2/ naaf keedhu Waaqa keenyaa /2/
Baleessera baayee maal jedheen dhiyaadhaa
Maaram na araarsii sumattan iyyadhaa
Addaam daba hojjeetee gatiin cubuu kiyyaa
Soodaadhee dhiyaachuuf Maaram maal naaf wayyaa
Ba’aa natii ta’ee dadhabee cubbuu koo
Rakkoon koo baay’ate beeke ballessaa koo
Otoon hindhiyaatin ta’uuf waamamuunkoo
Amanu dadhabe keessummaa ta’uu koo
Otoon daba hojjadhu dabruufi lubbun koo
Egaa nati hindhiisiin Maraami Giftii koo
Araara naaf kadhu ilma kee haadha koo /2/

title: Abbaan Keenya Yaa’iqoob
lyrics:
Dubroo Maariyaami kortoo warqeedha ati
Kortoo warqee kortoo warqeedha ati
Namaa fi Waaqayyoon araarsite
Abbaan keenya Yaa’iqoob karaa Loozaa irratti /2/
Hiirribni fudhatee ciise lafa irratti
Kortoo lafaa hanga samitti dhaqabdu
Fakkeenya kee argee yaa dubroo Maariyamii
Ergamoonni yeroo yaabatani fi bu’an /2/
Kan arge Yaa’iqob karaa irraa ciisuun
Abdii goodhachudhaan bara kan nageenya
Kunoo raawwatame sumaan giifti keenya
Sumaa fi Ilma keen nuf ta’ee nageenyi /2/
Abjuun Yaa’iqoob sumaan rawwaatamnaan
Namoonni fi ergamoonni adda adda kan turani
Dhaloota Ilma keetiin tokkummaan faarsani

title: Museen Kan Arge
lyrics:
Museen kan arge /2/ Gaara Siinarratti /2/
Biqiltu lalistudha ati /4/
translation:
ሙሴ ዘርእየ/2/በደብረ ሲና/2/
ሐመልማላዊት እጽ ሐመልማላዊት/4/

title: Qulqulloota Irra Qulqulleetti
lyrics:
Qulqullootarra qulqulleettii kan taate akka taabota Siinaa
Mana Waaqa keessa kanjiraatte dubrummaadhaan jiraatte /2/
Nyaanni ishee nyaata samiitii dhugaatiin ishees jecha Waaqati /2/
translation:
ንጽሕተ ንጹሐን ከዊና ከመታቦት ዘዶር ዘሲና
ውስተ ቤተ መቅደስ ነበረት በድንግልና }2
ሲሳያ ኀብስተ መና ወስቴሃኒ ስቴ ጽሙና/2/

title: Nuuf Kadhadhu
lyrics:
Nuuf kadhadhu giiftii Maariyaami nuf kadhadhu /2/
Ilmi kee akka nuf dhiisuuf moottumma isaas akka nudhaalchisuf /2/
translation:
ሰአሊ ነለ ማርያም ሰአሊ ነለ /2/
ወልድኪ ይምሐረነ ወመዋርስቲሁ ይረስየነ መድኃኔዓለም/2/

title: Yaa Garaa Laafeetii
lyrics:
Yaa garaa laafeettii kan nama hundaa jaallattu /2/
Yeroo hunduma /3/ fakkaatti /2/ biiftu kan ganama /2/
translation:
ኦ ርኀርኀተ ህሊና አፈቅሮተ ሰብእ ልማዳ /2/
ለእለጌሰሙ/4/ትመስል/3/ እንግዳ /2/

title: Maariyaam Dubroo
lyrics:
Maariyaami /2/ dubroo Maariyaami /2/
Garaa laafeettidha /4/ Maariyaamiin /2/
translation:
ማርያም ማርያም ድንግል ማርያም /2/
ርኀርኀተ ኀሊና/4/ ማርያም /2/

title: Nuufkadhadhu Giiftii
lyrics:
Nuuf kadhadhu Giiftii jennee sikadhanna /2/
Akka Efrem akka abbaa keenyaa nuuf kadhadhu nuufis Giftii keenya /2/
Uumama hundumaaf abdii isaaniidha ati
Hanga barabaraa dhaadannosaniti
Cubbuun isaanii isaaniif haqamee
Kadhanna keen lubbuun isaani fayyee /2/
Fulduraa Waaqayyoottii maqaan kee ulfatadhaa
Addunyaa fayyisuuf waada siif galeera
Kadhanna keen abdii nigodhatu
Yeroo hundaa qulqulleetti jedhu /2/
Addunyaan nuqoorte fedhi foon kenyaani
Dadhabdee lubbuunii cubbuun itti ulfaatu
Dukana’ee bitaa yoo nugalu
Ifti keenya kottuu haati keenya
Gaddi lubbuu keenyaa nutti ulfaateeraa
Cubbuun nuuti baayyate nudadhabsiiseera
Akka Elsabeex akka fira keetii
Nugammachisii nuunis jecha keetiin /2/

title: Yaa Giiftii Koo Abdijireenya Koo
lyrics:
Yaa Giiftii koo abdi jireenya koo gargaartuu koo misirroo Jannataa/2/
misirroo Jannataa/3/ yaa Maariyami si’i haatii Gooftaa/2/

title: Nagadhaan Nukottuu
lyrics:
Nagaadhaan nuukottu/2/ Maariyaami/2/
Sitti himanna /2/ gadda lubbu keenyaa
Nagadhaan nuukoottuu……………
Mika’eeliif/2/ Gabri’eeli wajjiin
Nagadhaan nukottuu……………
Suraafeeliif/2/ kirubeelii wajjiin
Nagadhaan nukottuu……………
Uraa’eeliif /2/ Ruufa’eeli wajjiin
Nagadhaan nukottuu……………
Qulqulloota /2/ Hunduma wajjiin
Ilmakee wajjiin/2/ Amanu’eelii
Nagadhaan nukottuu……………
translation:
በሰላም ንዒ/2/ ማርያም/2/
ትናዝዘኒ/2/ ኃዘነ ልብየ
አዝ….
ምስለ ሚካኤል/2/ ወገብርኤል
አዝ…
ምስለ ሱራፌል/2/ ወኪሩቤል
አዝ…
ምስለ ኡራኤል/2/ወሩፋኤል
አዝ…
ምስለ ኩሎሙ/2/ ቅዱሳን
አዝ….
ምስለ ወልድኪ/2/ አማኑኤል
አዝ….

title: Yaa Giftiikoo
lyrics:
Yaa giiftiikoo/2/ miladhu garakoo /2/
Nagaan ilma kee nawaajjin haata’uu /4/ eyyee
translation:
እግዚእትነ/2/ ነጽሪ ኀቤነ /2/
ሰላመ ወልድኪ የሃሎ ምስሌነ /4/ እኸ

title: Akka Mikaa'elaa ergamaa
lyrics:
Akka Mikaa'elaa ergamaa akka Gabri'eeli /2/
Nagadhan nuukoottu /4/ yaa mariyaami nagaadhan nuukoottu /2/ eyyee
translation:
ምስለ ሚካኤል ወገብርኤል ንዒ ሠናይትየ ማርያም/2/
ንዒ ድንግል ንዒ/2/ ድንግል ምስለ ሚካኤል/2/ኧኸ

title: Sigalateffanna
lyrics:
Sigalateffanna dubroo maariyaami /2/
Abdii waan nuutaatef akka kufne hinhafneef /4/ eyyee
Utuu sanyii siin hanbiisu baate /2/
Ibiddi akka sadoomif gamooraa dhala namaanyaate /4/ eyyee

title: Dubartoota Keessa
lyrics:
Dubartoota keessa filamte kennaa Waaqarra kan argatte
Gammadii yeroo hundumaa/2/ yaa Maariyaamii abdiin koo suma/2/

title: Maaluma
lyrics:
Maalumaan maaliin fakkessina haadha Goofta keenya/2/
Haadha keenya Giifti keenya qulqulleetti eyyee Maariyaamin maalin
fakkeessamti/2/

title: Uumama Hunduma Irraa
lyrics:
Uumama hundumarraa qulqullummaa
Jechaan kan hin himamnee olaantumma
Yoomis kan hin dabarre dubrummaa
Kun hundumtu kan sii kenname ati
Ulfina kan qabdu Waaqayyoo biratti
Abdii Aaddaam taate lafa kana irratti
Araarsituun keenya Maariyaam qulqulleetti
Baha biiftudha ati iftuu kan ganamaa
Kan taatee argamtee burqituu jireenyaa
Nageenyaaf jaalalaan kan guutamtee ati
Eenyun fakkessamta yaa garaa laafeti
Kitaaba gaarumma nagaa lubbuu keenya
Haadha haadha caaltu Maariyaam Giiftii keenya
Abaaboo urgooftu biqiiltu jeennataa
Karaa keen dhiyaanne nuti gara Gooftaa
Qulqulloota caalaa quluqulluu kan taate
Haadha isaa akka taatuuf Gooftaan sii filate
Ifa ifa caaltu karaa kan jireenyaa
Siin hordofne gallaa gara biyya keenyaa

title: Mucaa Kee Baachudhaan
lyrics:
Yeroo tokko dugdaa keetii yeroo tokko cinaacha keettii /2/
Mucaa kee baachudhaani /2/ baay’ee dadhabdee ati /4/
translation:
ምዕረ በዘባንኪ ወምዕረ በገቦኪ /2/
በሀዚለ ሕጻን/2/ እፎ ደከምኪ /4/

title: Beela Kee fi Dheebuu Kee
lyrics:
Beelaa keefi dheebuukee yaadachisi Dubroo belaakeef dheebuukee
Rakkinaaf gaddakees yaadachis Dubroo
translation:
ረሀበ ወጽማ አዘክሪ ድንግል ረሀበ ወጽምዓ /2/
ምንዳቤ ወኀዘነ አዘክሪ ድንግል /2/

title: Akka Nu Eebbistuuf
lyrics:
Akka nu eebbistuuf warqeefannootiin /3/
Deddebi’ii nuuf kadhuu /4/ Mika’eelii lalisa warqee /2/
translation:
ከመ ትባርከነ በመስቀልከ ዘወርቅ /2/
ተዋነይ በጽድቅ/4/ገብርኤል ሐመልማለ ወርቅ /2/

title: Yaa Gabreelii nuu araarsi
lyrics:
Yaa Gabreelii nuu araarsi Waaqa keenyani /2/
Akka hin badne akka hin dune lubu keenyani
Abdii qulqulluu nuu dhaabbadhu duura keenyani /2/

title: Dandeetii Waan Dhabdeef
lyrics:
Dandeettii waan dhabdeef ergamoota ilaaluuf
Koopha kan taatee yoo namatti fakkateef
Kan sii wajjiin jiran baay’eedha isaani
Dadhabbii fi koophumaa looltoonni Sooriyaan
Eeboosaa luqqisee roorrisullee rakkoon
Naa dhumeera jettee lubbu koo hin soodaatiin
Qulqullootni Ergamoonni jiruutii sii wajjiin
Gara Baabiloonittigoodaantee deemtullee
Jireenyii hadhaayee angoon kee kufullee
Tsiiyooninii yaadachaa Boo’an liqimfamtee
Naannookee qubatan sitasgabbessuf ergamooni
Iyyariikoo addunyaan dalla torba ijaarte
Cubbuun yoo qophooftu xiyyaashee cimsitee
Kan moo’atamtee fi siidhuume yoo siitti fakkate
Ergaamoonni Waaqa simarsaanii jiru

title: Akka Anaaniya (Nujajjabeesi)
lyrics:
Akka Anaaniya akka Azaariya akka Misaa’eeli nujajjabeessi/2/
Nujajjabeessi /2/ amanti keeynaanii nujajjabeessi/2/

title: Ergamaa Gabri’eel
lyrics:
Ergamaa Gabri’eel fuuldura Waaqayyoo/2/ dhaabbata /2/
Ilmaan namootaa fi dhiifamaaf nageenya kadhataa /2/

title: Abbootiin Qulqullu
lyrics:
Abbootiin qulqulluu amantiin ta’anii
Gargaarsa Waaqayyoon raajii hojjetani
Abrahaam barbaade Waaqa isaa argate
Tokkicha ilma isaa aarsaaf dhiyeeffate
Waaqayyoo aamantii isaa fedhii isaa hubatee
Bakka mucaa isaa hoola isaaf laate
Museen amantiidhaan ulee isaa qাবate
Galaana Eertiraa bal’icha addaan kute
Ummata Isra’eeliif raajii guddaa hojate
Ililleef gammachuun Waaqa waaqeffatee
Sabni Israa’eli yeroo waaqa yakke
Eliyaas amantiin bokkaa samii dhorkee
Fuldura diina isaa ciminaan dhaabbate
Waaqa isaatifis aarsa dhiyeeffate
Phexiroos maqaa Waaqaan naafa laፋ kaase
Phawuloos huccusaatiin dhibama fayyise
Namoonni Waaqayyoo amantiin taa’ani
Gooftaa isaanii irraa waan baay’ee argatani

title: Gooftaa Kadhate
lyrics:
Kan isa rukkutaniif kadhate Isxiifaanoos Qulqulluni /2/
Gooftaa dhiisiif cubbuu isaanii Jechuudhaani /4/
translation:
ሰአለ ሥርየተ ኃጢአት ለእለ ወገርዎ/2/
ወይቤ ሥረይሎሙ ዘንተ ኃጢአቶሙ/4/

title: Qulqulloonni Hinduune
lyrics:
Qulqulloonni hinduune gara Waaqayyoo deemanii /2/
Biyya samii irrattii /4/ argachuufi waan fedhani /2/
translation:
ጻድቃንሰ ኢሞቱ ሀበ እግዚኦሙ ነገዱ /2/
በመንግስተ ሰማይ/4/ይሁቦሙ ዘፈቀዱ /2/

title: Kadhatan Baasiliyoosi fi Gorgooriyos
lyrics:
Kadhatan Baasiliyoosi fi Gorgooriyosi fuldura fakkii qulqulluu Marqooriyosii /2/
Gadi jedhe fakkiin /2/ kan Marqooriyosii akka waan awwaatuu gammadani
Baasiliyoosii fi Gorgooriyoosii /2/
translation:
ጸለዩ ባስልዮስ ወጎርጎርዮስ ሀበ ስዕሉ ለቅዱስ መርቆርዮስ /2/
ደነነ ሥዕል/2/ዘመርቆርዮስ ከመ ኦሆ ዘይብል ወተፈስሑ ባስልዮስ
ወጎርገርዮስ /2/

title: Takla Hayimaanoot
lyrics:
Takla Hayimaanoot ifa aduunyatti /2/
Kunoo bara baraan ni ifa gochi isaani /2/

title: Qulqulluu Maarqoos
lyrics:
Urjii ifaan qulqulluu Maarqoos kan argame Iskindiriiyaarraa
Bataskaanaf abbaa ta’eera /2/
Ta’eera abbaa warra Gibxii fi Itiyoophiyaafis akka qulqulluu Phaawuloos
ta’eera /2/
translation:
ኮከብ ብሩህ ቅዱስ ማርቆስ ዘሰረቀ እምእስክንድርያ
ቤተክርስትያን ዘንሰምያ/2/
ኮኖሙ አበ ለሰብአ ግብጽ ወኢትዮጵያ በከመ ጳውሎስ ሐዋርያ/2/

title: Akka Seera Keessaa hin Baane
lyrics:
Kitaaba qulqulluu hunduu nidubbisaa
Boqonnaa fi lakkoofsa hundu ni caqasa
Kana qofa mitii haa beekኑ iccitii isaa /2/
Akka fedhii keenyatti yoo dubbisnee hiikne /2/
Dogoggora baay’een boodatti deebine /2/
Raajiin fedhii namaan goonkumaa hin dhufne /2/
Nugorsa kitaabni akka seera keessaa hin baane /2/
Gaafannee haa barannu haayyoota amantii /2/
Kitaaba haa dubbisnu ragaa akka nuu ta’uu /2/

title: Nandhibiin lubbuu koo
lyrics:
Nandhibin lubbuu koomee narrakisiini/2/
Tokkicha sii uumee waaqayyooti amani /2/
Deebi'i lubbuu koo nugara kee yaadi
Akka fanifamee gooftaa kee barbaadi
Gooftaa nu kennuu isaa fanoora oluun isaa
Seexan haarka baase sitaasiissuuf kansaa
Daandi isaa daandi kee goodhiti qabadhu
Cubbuudabarsiteef Gooftaati dhiyaadhu
Kan darbunke hin olee kan boru dabartuuf
Of beeki lubbuu koo hinbitamin cubbuuf
Gammachun kee haara'aa booru siboochistii
Mootummaa Waaqayyoo yaadi kan kee taatii
Mana kee ijaarradhuu lubbuu koo gorsami
Ajaja waaqayyoof jaalalan bitami

title: Ishoo Ishoo
lyrics:
Ishoo /5/
Waaqnii nawajjin jiraa ishoo /2/
Hiyyeessa fakkaadhus ishoo /2/
Qabeenya yoon dhabes ishoo /2/
Jaalalli Waaqayyoo ishoo /2/
Nadhiisee hin beekuu ishoo /2/
Hiyyuummaan jiraachaa ishoo /2/
Qullaa koo yoon deemes ishoo /2/
Gammadeen jiraadha ishoo /2/
Qalbiin koo boqotee ishoo /2/
Waaqni waan na waameef ishoo /2/
Gammachu guddadhaaf ishoo /2/
Fuulli koo ifaa dha ishoo /2/
Ganamaaf galgalaa ishoo /2/
Sinbirroota illee ishoo /2/
Kan hin dhiisnee Gooftaan ishoo /2/
Haagalateffamu ishoo /2/
Ganamaaf galgala ishoo /2/
Eebba hojii kootiif ishoo /2/
Yeroo hundaa hin dhabu ishoo /2/
Waaqni haagalatoomuu ishoo /2/
Kan na hin qaanessiinee ishoo /2/

title: Dandetii Isaatiini
lyrics:
Dandettii isaatiin Waaquma isaatiini /2/
Cubbuu nuuf dhiisaa baay’ee nu eegaa/2/ arjummaa isaatiin
Maaltu kennamaafi gatiin isaas maalidha
Waaqa nu uumeefi kan nu jiraachisuuf
Yeroo kan nu kenne qalbi jijjirrachuuf
Akka jala hin badnef du’aa irraa nu oolchuuf
Cubbuu nuuf dhisaa baay’ee nu egaa/2/ arjummaa isaatiin
Namni badisaa irraa hanga deebi’uuf
Ni obsa Waaqayyoon waan hamaa fiduufi
Obsi isaa bal’aadha guddaadha gochisaa
Kennee jalaa hin dhumuu baay’ee dha arjummaansaa

title: Yaa Mana Waaqayyoo
lyrics:
Yaa mana Waaqayyoo ulfina qabeetti
Koottu nu eebbisi Maariyaam qulqulleetti
Karaa badii irraa ati nu deebisi
Ilma kee kadhadhu maaloo nu araarsi
Duumeessa Eeliyaas kan itti abdanne
Qoricha Naahoomi kan ittin fayyinee
Mootiin bara baraa kan hin jijjiramne
Kiristoos Waaqayyo sii haadha nuuf kenne
Arjoomni bishaani maqaa keen kennamee
Lubbuu du’ee wajjin yommuu madaalame
Fayyinaaf ta’eera nutis kana beekne
Nu dhagahi Giifti yommuu si waammannee
Nu wajjin dhaabadhu yaa Giiftii Maariyaami
Ilma kee nuuf kadhu jireenyaaf nu waami
Nu humna hin qabnu si godhaanna hirkoo
Ati nu jabeessi haadha gaafa rakkoo

title: Lubbuu Siif Abbomamu
lyrics:
Lubbuu siif abbomamu yaa Waaqayyo ati nu kenni
Gurra qalbii keenyas atii nuu bani
Dhugadhaan kadhate kan si dhageessisu
Yakka irraa fagaate kan si gammachiisu
Nuu kenni yaa Gooftaa lubbuu qulqulla’e
Waan gaarii hojjechuuf kan dafee qophaa’e
Gaarummadhaan deemuuf akka jecha keetti
Beenyaa nuu ta’uu kee hubanne sirriitti
Nuti akka jiraannuuf suga kee argannee
Nu gargaarii Gooftaa yeroo si kadhanne
Gaddaaf dhiphina nu biraa balleessi
Deemsa keenya hunda ati nu sirreessi
Jaalala kee guddaa jabeenya godhanne
Gara kee haa dhufnu cubbuu irraa deebine
Akka nurra buluuf jaalalli mana kee
Waaqayyo nuu kenni hubanno jecha kee
Humni kee olaanaan biyyoo irraa nu kaasee
Nu haa qulqulleessu diina keenya cabsee

title: Jaalalli Waaqayyo
lyrics:
Jaalalli Waaqayyoo anaaf baay’ateera
Aangoo mucummaa isaa tolaan naa kenneera
Jaalala isaa guddaa fannoodhan mullisee
Innumti nuu du’ee du’a irraa nu baasee
Mucummaa koo dhiisee isaa irraa fagaannan
Addunya jaalladhe hiyyummaa filannaan
Cubbudhaaf bitamuus na hin jibbine Gooftaan
Na deebisee malee nawaame jaalalan
Na fayyisuuf jedhee baay’ee gidiramee
Finciluu koo obsee ofitti na waamee
Bittaa seexana irraa bilisa nu baase
Uffata ulfinaa narrati deebise
Du’a isaan ulfina kan na gonfachiiseef
Dukkana na baasee kan ifa naa kenneef
Arjummaa kanaaf maalan dhiyyeefadhaa
Uumaa samiif lafaa nan galateeffadhaa

title: Yaa namaa deebi’i
lyrics:
Yaa namaa deebi’ii gara Waaqa keetti
Maaliif irraa kaate waa’e lubbu keeti
Fedha fooniis dhiisi soobe sii goyyomsa
Isatti dhaabuun kee abidatti bulta
Kanaaf yaa namoota jedhe yaadachisa
Jiraachuun qophaa’a fedha fooniin dhiisa
Yaa nama qophaa’I dhufa Goofta keeti
Mirgasaa dhaabbate akka gammaduuf
Cubbuurraa deebi’i qalbi jijjirradhu
Balleessa kee dhiisi Waaqa kee kadhadhu

title: Yaa Waaqayyoo
lyrics:
Yaa Waaqayyoo nuuti sikadhannaa kadhannaa keenya dhaga’i/2/
Yeroo rakkoo keenya maqaa kee waammannaa
Akka nuu qaqqabduus abdiidhaan eggannaa
Daandii seexannarra akka nuu deebistu
Yaa Waaqa sii kadhannaa akka nuu fayyistuu
Jechi fi goorsi kee jireenya nuuf keenna
Hiirkoo nuu haa ta’u nutiis dafne kaana
Goofta nu simadhu harka kee ballisi
Dhufneera gara kee kunoo nu ebbiisi
Goorsa keetiin deemuun hundee jireenyaati
Seerri kee qulqulluun daandii fayyinaati
Toolaaf arjummaa kee gaachana godhanne
Ulfinaan jiraanna garbummaadha baane
Yeroo bara bara si wajjiin jiraachuuf diina harka baane
Diina harka baane mootummaa kee dhaaluuf
Qoophofnee sii eeguuf wangeela raawwanne
Dandeetti nu kenni yaa Waaqa sii kadhanne

title: Anaaf Waaqayyookoo
lyrics:
Anaaf Waaqayyoodha abdiin cuubukootii /2/
Isattan himadhaa yeroo rakkoo kootii /2/
Abdiin jireenyaa koo jabeenyi lubbuu koo /2/
Waaqayyoo gooftaadha humna qabeessi koo /2/
Waaqayyoo gooftaan koo anaaf hirkoo koodha /2/
Rakkina koo hundaaf anaaf abdii koodha /2/
Abdiin koo siirratti yaa arjaa gooftaa koo /2/
Ati irraa naqabi yeroo gidiraa koo/2/
Maariyaam haadha Iyyesuus araara qabeettii /2/
Nagaan siif haata’u yeroo hunduumaatti /2/
Fannoon gooftaakootii anaaf fayyiisaadha /2/
Warraa itti hin amanneef garuu goowwummaadha /2/
Anaaf Waaqayyoodha abdiin cuubu kootii /2/
Isattan himadha yeroo rakkoo kootii /2/

title: Waaqayyoo Gooftaakoo
lyrics:
Waaqayyoo gooftaa koo siin ayyaaneeffadha
Waan ati naa taateef siin galaateeffadha /2/
Nafayyisuuf jettee waaqa irraa gad-buutee
Uumaa waaqaaf lafaa duurba irraa dhalattee
Anumaaf jeetteti rebamuun keetisi
Siif maal kennu laata gooftaa koo Iyyesusi
Naaf jettee gooftaa koo rakkattee dhiphattee
Akka ani hin duuneef Waaqa irraa gad-buutee
Maalin kenna laata ani Waaqayyoo kootiifi
Inni naa rakkatee nafayyisuudhaafi
Ani homaa hinqabu waanan Waaqaa kennu
Galata duwwaadha wantan isaaf galchu
Galata kee haata’u yaa Waaqayyoo gooftaa
Waan hundumaa caala galata jaallatta

title: Yaa Namaa
lyrics:
Yaa namaa/2/ dafiti deebi’i gara Waaqa keeti /2/
Gooftaan otoo hin dhufiin qalbi jijjirradhu /2/
Badisaa dhufurra dafiti baqadhu /2/
Biyyi lafa kuni sobee si gooyyomsa /2/
Yeroof sitti tole abiddi si buusa /2/
Yakka kee dhisiti Waaqayyo kadhadhu /2/
Akka fayyituufi cubburra fagaadhu /2/
Fedha keetiif jette Waaqarraa fagaate /2/
Harkuma keetiin abidda of buuste /2/

title: Goftaan Qorameera
lyrics:
Goftaan qorameera diina hamaadhaani
Sooma yoohundeessuu jireenya keenyaafi /2/
Jaalalaaf nageenya nuuf kenniti soomnii
Dhuma kan hinqabne baruma baraani /2/
Firii sooma kanaa nu hundumtuu beeknee
Dafnee haaqabannuu akka nu hin darbine /2/

title: Muuseen Some/zema/
lyrics:
Gaara Siinaa irrattii (2)Muuseen soomeera
Fakkeenya nu’iif ta’uuf Gooftaan keenyas soomeera
translation:
ሙሴኒ ጾመ/2/ በደብረ ሲና /2/
እግዚእነ ጾመ አርአያሁ ከመ የሀበነ /2/

title: Kan some
lyrics:
Kan some kan kadhate /2/ /2/
Dhuguma gati isaa ni argataa /4/
translation:
ዘጾመ ወጸለየ ወሰአለ/2/
እሙነ ይነሥእ እሴቶ/4/

title: Gooftaan keenya nuuf some
lyrics:
Gooftaan keenya nuuf some guyyaa afurtama /2/
Fakkeenya nuuf keennuuf fakkeenya /4/

title: Manni Kiristaanaa Tokkuma
lyrics:
Manni kiristaana tokkuma balballi fayyinaas ishuma
Ishuma iddoon dhiifamaa }2
Haa tajaajillu /2/ eyyee jaalalaan yaa nama /2/
translation:
ቤተክርስቲያን አሐቲ አንቀጸ አድኀኖ ይእቲ/2/ ድብረ ምሕረት /2/
ትግሁ ባቲ/2/ ሕዝበ ክርስቲያን ኧኸ እንበለ አጽርዖ /2/

title: Galannii
lyrics:
Galanni Waaqayyoof haa ta’u inni nuu uumeera akka isa waaqeffannuuf.
Galanni Maariyaamifis Haadha Gooftaaf haa ta’u isheen Giiftii keenya
akkasumas abdii keenya.
